QuestData.Title: Exeunt, Triumphant
QuestData.Description:
From what I saw, the queen fell back to the Wild Hatchery. It is an outpost to keep watch over the proto-drakes in the area... I only hope that its defenses are enough.
We must head there at once!
QuestData.LogDescription: Escape the Frostflash Enclave with Majordomo Selistra.
QuestData.RewardText:
I could not rest until the eggs were safe... this is a relief.
Thank you, $p.

Objectives.Objective: Speak to Majordomo Selistra at the Wild Hatchery
